# Driving Course

The SAAQ oversees the contents of the driving courses (SAAQ road safety education programs). It recognizes schools that can offer driving courses for the purposes of obtaining a driver's licence. It also supports students should their driving school close, be sold, or have its recognition revoked. The SAAQ also processes complaints received regarding driving schools.

## Driving schools recognized by the SAAQ

Only driving schools recognized by the SAAQ offer the programs that are mandatory for obtaining a driver's licence. [Find a recognized driving school](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/driving-course/finding-recognized-driving-school).

Learn more about the duration and structure of the different driving courses. Consult learning material as well as useful exercises.

Last update: November 5, 2025

- ## See also

[Obtaining a Driver's Licence](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/drivers-licences/obtaining-licence/passenger-vehicle-class-5)

## Safety first, on the road and online

We are committed to protecting your personal information and privacy. That's why, when we collect data, we follow a [Policy on Privacy](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/policies/privacy) that is responsible and transparent. By continuing to browse without modifying your preferences, you accept the use of cookies.
